nodes.text: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. There is a small mailbox here.

actions.read: You read the letter. It says: 'Dear Sir or Madam, We regret to inform you that the bank is closed.'

nodes.text: You are standing in an open field north of a white house. There is a weird looking box in the corner.

actions.read: You read the letter. It says: 'Dear Sir or Madam, We regret to inform you that the bank is closed.'

nodes.text: You are inside a building, a well house for a large spring.
